name: British American Tobacco plc
description: British American Tobacco plc (BAT) is one of the world’s leading multinational companies in the tobacco and nicotine industry. Established in 1902, BAT is headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and operates in over 180 markets worldwide. The company is renowned for its diverse portfolio of brands, including iconic names such as Dunhill, Lucky Strike, and Pall Mall, as well as emerging products in the reduced-risk category, including vaping and heated tobacco products such as Vype and Glo. With a commitment to sustainability and responsibility, BAT is strategically shifting its focus towards innovative, reduced-risk products to meet the evolving preferences of consumers while reducing the health impacts associated with traditional tobacco smoking. This transformation is part of the company’s ambition to achieve a greater than 50% revenue contribution from non-combustible products by 2030. BAT invests heavily in research and development to create new products and technologies, aiming to lead the transformation of the tobacco industry. The company is also committed to transparency and governance, actively engaging with stakeholders to address public health concerns related to tobacco consumption. As a major player in the global market, BAT continues to navigate regulatory challenges and changing consumer attitudes while pursuing its goal of a smoke-free future.
